price: او له هغوى مخكې مو د فرعون قوم ازمويلى و او يو عزتمن رسول ورغلى و.
arabic: ۞ وَلَقَدۡ فَتَنَّا قَبۡلَهُمۡ قَوۡمَ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَجَآءَهُمۡ رَسُولٞ كَرِيمٌ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: walaqad fatannā qablahum qawma fir'ʿawna wajāahum rasūlun karīmun
